See the License for the specific language governing rights * and limitations under the License. * The Original Code is Compiere ERP & Business Solution * The Initial Developer of the Original Code is Jorg Janke and ComPiere, Inc. * Portions created by Jorg Janke are Copyright (C) 1999-2001 Jorg Janke, * parts created by ComPiere are Copyright (C) ComPiere, Inc.; * All Rights Reserved. * Contributor(s): Openbravo SL * Contributions are Copyright (C) 1999-2005 Openbravo, S.L ************************************************************************* * $Id: GL_JournalLine_Trg.sql,v 1.3 2002/07/01 02:29:00 jjanke Exp $ *** * Title: Journal Line * Description: * - Update Journal Totals ************************************************************************/ v_ID NUMBER; v_RO NUMBER; BEGIN -- Get ID IF(UPDATING OR INSERTING) THEN v_ID:=:new.GL_Journal_ID; ELSE v_ID:=:old.GL_Journal_ID; END IF; -- ReadOnly Check SELECT COUNT(*) INTO v_RO FROM GL_Journal WHERE GL_Journal_ID=v_ID AND(Processed='Y' OR Posted='Y') ; IF(v_RO > 0) THEN RAISE_APPLICATION_ERROR(-20501, 'Document processed/posted') ; END IF; -- Subtract Old Amount IF(UPDATING OR DELETING) THEN IF(:old.IsActive='Y') THEN UPDATE GL_Journal SET TotalDr=TotalDr - :old.AmtSourceDr, TotalCr=TotalCr - :old.AmtSourceCr WHERE GL_Journal_ID=:old.GL_Journal_ID; END IF; END IF; -- Add new Amount IF(INSERTING OR UPDATING) THEN IF(:new.IsActive='Y') THEN UPDATE GL_Journal SET TotalDr=TotalDr + :new.AmtSourceDr, TotalCr=TotalCr + :new.AmtSourceCr WHERE GL_Journal_ID=:new.GL_Journal_ID; END IF; END IF; END GL_JournalLine_Trg
